一条胳膊和一条腿：为了获得健康保险，这对夫妇拍了一部电影去年秋天，艾伦·豪恩 (Ellen Haun) 和德鲁·约翰斯顿 (Dru Johnston) 忙着整理 2023 年的健康保险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/An-Arm-and-a-Leg-To-get-health-insurance-this- Couple-made-a-movie.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/An-Arm-and-a-Leg-To-get-health-insurance-this- Couple-made-a-movie.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3775d60-aabc-42aa-b02b-fa3bebacef60 Thu, 30 Nov 2023 13:10:35 -0500 An Arm and a Leg: To get health insurance, this couple made a movie
联邦贸易委员会主席准备与私募股权摊牌联邦贸易委员会最近提起的一项民事诉讼指控美国最大的麻醉集团之一的垄断行为，导致价格大幅上涨，这对私募股权投资者来说是一个警告，可能会削弱他们大举收购医生集团的力度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/FTC-chief-gears-up-for-a-showdown-with-private-equity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/FTC-chief-gears-up-for-a-showdown-with-private-equity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5275788d-04e9-4758-9578-e168ac59ae8d Thu, 30 Nov 2023 13:06:57 -0500 FTC chief gears up for a showdown with private equity
埃尔顿·约翰 (Elton John) 在议长府发表讲话，欢迎将艾滋病毒选择退出检测范围扩大到英格兰 46 个事故和紧急救援中心，并呼吁所有政治领导人采取更多措施来终结艾滋病今天，埃尔顿·约翰在议长府举行的全党议会艾滋病毒/艾滋病问题招待会上受到了表彰，以表彰他个人以及通过埃尔顿·约翰艾滋病基金会的工作对终结艾滋病流行的持久承诺。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Elton-John-welcomes-expansion-of-opt-out-testing-for-HIV-to-46-Accident-Emergency-sites-across-England-并在演讲者之家.aspx 的演讲中呼吁所有政治领导人采取更多行动来终结艾滋病https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/Elton-John-welcomes-expansion-of-opt-out-testing-for-HIV-to-46-Accident-Emergency-sites-across-England-并在演讲者之家.aspx#comment 的演讲中呼吁所有政治领导人采取更多行动来终结艾滋病https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84ec5819-cf39-477f-8151-7c4dde70697b Thu, 30 Nov 2023 07:36:00 -0500 Elton John welcomes expansion of opt-out testing for HIV to 46 Accident & Emergency sites across England and calls on all political leaders to do more to end AIDS in a speech at Speaker's House
对疑似急性冠状动脉综合征患者实施高灵敏度心肌肌钙蛋白 I 检测对长期结果的影响英国的研究人员评估了使用高灵敏度测定法测量心肌肌钙蛋白 I 及其对心肌梗死 (MI) 风险或其他长期结果（例如疑似急性冠状动脉综合征患者五年内死亡）的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/The-impact-of-implementing-a-high-sensitivity-assay-for-cardiac-troponin-I-on-long-term-outcomes-in-疑似急性冠状动脉综合征患者.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/The-impact-of-implementing-a-high-sensitivity-assay-for-cardiac-troponin-I-on-long-term-outcomes-in-疑似急性冠状动脉综合征患者.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6f35d9bd-2a32-4cc6-b07a-926edf7f6528 Thu, 30 Nov 2023 05:55:00 -0500 The impact of implementing a high sensitivity assay for cardiac troponin I on long term outcomes in patients with suspected acute coronary syndrome

新研究提供了令人信服的证据，证明 Cylicins 在精子发育和生育能力中的重要作用研究人员通过成簇规则间隔短回文重复序列 (CRISPR)/CRISPR 相关蛋白 9 (Cas9) 基因编辑研究了 Cylicins 在小鼠和人类精子发生和男性生育能力中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/New-study-provides-concincing-evidence-of-the-essential-role-of-cylicins-in-sperm-development-and-fertility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231130/New-study-provides-concincing-evidence-of-the-essential-role-of-cylicins-in-sperm-development-and-fertility.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4be5a06b-0865-41c3-8ae1-0204b2f73a9d Thu, 30 Nov 2023 05:02:00 -0500 New study provides convincing evidence of the essential role of cylicins in sperm development and fertility
